profiles.name: Mai
profiles.title: Lead Editor
bio: Growing up, I enjoyed watching fan-made music videos of my favourite films and TV shows. I was amazed at how people were able to make new narratives with the limited material they had and sometimes even make the emotional moments in the shows even more hard-hitting with their music and editing choices.
Narrative editing
Learn special effects for film and better non-linear storytelling techniques
I enjoy learning languages, shooting analogue film, and attending local film festivals that showcase Philippine regional cinema.
